Title: Relates to high school equivalency diplomas
Summary: Relates to high school equivalency diplomas.
LawCode: Add §317-a, amd §§355, 6206 & 6301, Ed L; amd §97-hhh, St Fin L; amd §2807-g, Pub Health L; amd §336, Soc Serv L; amd §§803 & 2, Cor L; amd §§3-209 & 21-703, NYC Ad Cd; amd §58, Civ Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, the state finance law, the public health law, the social services law, the correction law, the administrative code of the city of New York and the civil service law, in relation to high school equivalency diplomas
